subject: New FAQ item? (Re: [junit] Textui.TestRunner regarding)
msgSnippet: Maybe this should be a FAQ item, if not already: common mistakes when running the samples. Perhaps a polite reference to a tutorial explaining what CLASSPATH
messageBody:
Maybe this should be a FAQ item, if not already: common mistakes when
running the samples. Perhaps a polite reference to a tutorial
explaining what CLASSPATH is would be nice.

Does anyone have a pointer to send to Mike on the subject?

Thanks.

*********** REPLY SEPARATOR ***********

On 2002-07-22 at 19:25 sreenivasa reddy wrote:

>Hello,
>
>I'm using JSDK 1.4 and Junit 3.7 on Win 98. And When I try to run
>junit.textui.TestRunner from the command prompt, I'm getting an
Exception
>in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: MoneyTest (wrong
name:
>junit/samples/money/MoneyTest).
>
>Whereas, junit.swingui.TestRunner is working fine.
>
>I've checked the CLASSPATH and it is set to junit/samples/ and
>junit/samples/money and junit/junit.jar. I am unable to reason, why
I'm
>facing this problem.
>
>Can anyone of you, please help me out.
>
>
>Thanks,
>
>Sreenivas
>
>
>
